statements: DELETE FROM TheaterFeedback WHERE show_id = 101 AND audience_rating > 4
DELETE FROM TheaterFeedback WHERE review_text LIKE '%excellent%'
DELETE FROM audience_feedback WHERE rating < 3 AND show_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
DELETE FROM show_reviews WHERE reviewer_name = 'John Doe' AND review LIKE 'Bad%' AND show_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440001';

DELETE FROM shows WHERE show_date < '2023-01-01' AND show_id = 200;
DELETE FROM audience WHERE show_id = 10 AND audience_age > 18;
DELETE FROM reviews WHERE reviewer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM Ratings WHERE show_id = 5 AND average_rating < 2.5;
